text: now as promised let's return to that
breaking news that news of explosion on
board a bus in Jerusalem let me just
show you the first pictures have been
coming in to the BBC of the scene of
this incident it is in the southwest of
Jerusalem and you can see just two
completely burnt out bus there right in
the foreground of the pictures it's
thought that actually no was not no one
was on board that bus there are two
buses in close proximity it is thought
that most of the injured were on board a
second of the buses but this explosion
and the numbers do vary with different
reports from different news agencies
I've read it just in the last few
seconds at the numbers vary between 10
to 15 to 20 but clearly you can see a
very serious incident that the emergency
services are dealing with and the blast
comes amid a wave of Palestinian attacks
on Israelis mostly stabbings and of
course the fear will be that it is some
form of return to the suicide attacks
that were targeted on Israeli cities a
decade ago but there you see just the
shells of the buses it is unclear from
the emergency services whether we are
talking about deaths or injuries but
those the first pictures from Jerusalem
